Html: Hi ! Have been using Naudio to play sound simultaneously in two devices. I want to know if i could differentiate in between USB and other sound cards. What i am trying to achieve is to play sound only on the native speaker and the headset chosen (and not all other USB headsets).
I'm afraid I don't know of a way to discover this. It may be that something in the WASAPI IMMDevice property store might provide this information.
